definition: stay clear from; keep away from; keep out of the way of someone or something

children.definition: escape potentially unpleasant consequences; get away with a forbidden action
use cunning or deceit to escape or avoid
avoid or try to avoid fulfilling, answering, or performing (duties, questions, or issues)
dodge, avoid answering, or take for granted
evade the truth of a point or question by raising irrelevant objections
refrain from entering or walking onto
avoid and stay away from deliberately; stay clear of
avoid having to deal with some unpleasant task
